DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine effect innovative program , entitle CRISP ( Community Integration Socially Isolated Patients ) , improve self-efficacy assess whether improve self-efficacy help reduce depression loneliness people MS .
DOC.detailed_description: Whether CRISP increase self-efficacy decrease loneliness depression
DOC.criteria: Age 18 65 year old . Must definitive diagnosis MS physician . Must understand English 6th grade level since CRISP program require participant comprehend educational information present English . Agree participate 12 group session 12 week ; Must ability complete questionnaire English since outcome measure use study English . Must able commute site destination Have actively psychotic Axis I disorder . Have significant Axis II disorder borderline personality disorder schizoid personality disorder . Have diagnosis another neurological condition aside MS . Inability comply study requirements/visits .
